name: marble your wordpress
author: stonz

sections.description: marble your wordpress is a widget display in the admin area and constantly remind you the power of marble and stons.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Choose the right widget version for your wordpress version.
  2. Upload marble-your-wordpress.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
is the widget considering my wordpress theme?

yes. the widget referrer to your content wordpress theme.
